The Supreme Leader has arrived---!"},{"lineNumber":3724,"originalJapaneseLine":"　敵は全部ころーす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll kill all the enemies!\""},{"lineNumber":3725,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毛利が長姉、てる…………参る！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mōri's eldest sister, Teru... I submit!\""},{"lineNumber":3726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっふっふーん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, fufufuun..."},{"lineNumber":3727,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さぁ、覗きの時間がやってきましたよと。","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, the time for peeping has come."},{"lineNumber":3728,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誰が来るかなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder who will show up."},{"lineNumber":3729,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さぁて、湯浴みか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, a bath, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":3730,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっと、来た。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, here they come."},{"lineNumber":3731,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあチャンスターイム！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, it's chance time!\""},{"lineNumber":3732,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは手近な掃除用具入れに隠れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance hid in the nearby cleaning supplies closet."},{"lineNumber":3733,"originalJapaneseLine":"「湯だけJAPAN様式というのも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Having only the water be in the Japanese style is"},{"lineNumber":3734,"originalJapaneseLine":"　妙なものだが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"a strange thing, though...\""},{"lineNumber":3735,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ぬっ、てるさんか……流石にああも腹がでかいと、","translatedEnglishLine":"(Uh, Teru-san... as expected, with such a big belly,"},{"lineNumber":3736,"originalJapaneseLine":"　襲う気にならん……）","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't feel like attacking...)"},{"lineNumber":3737,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph\""},{"lineNumber":3738,"originalJapaneseLine":"てるは服にかけた手を止め、","translatedEnglishLine":"Teru stopped her hand that was on her clothes,"},{"lineNumber":3739,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの所まで一直線に歩き出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and started walking straight towards Rance."},{"lineNumber":3740,"originalJapaneseLine":"（げ、げげげ！　ば、ばれ……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Ge-gege! I’ve been, been caught...!)"},{"lineNumber":3741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……貴様か。何をしている」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's you. What are you doing?\""},{"lineNumber":3742,"originalJapaneseLine":"「が、がはははは、よく分かったな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"G-gahahaha, you figured it out well!"},{"lineNumber":3743,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺の完全な隠密を見破るとは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"To see through my perfect stealth!\""},{"lineNumber":3744,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たわけ。掃除用具が乱れている気配があったから","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fool. Because there was a sign the cleaning tools were disturbed,"},{"lineNumber":3745,"originalJapaneseLine":"　調べてみれば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I investigated and...\""},{"lineNumber":3746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふははは、流石はてるさんだな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fuhahaha, as expected of Teru-san!"},{"lineNumber":37247,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見事！　ではいざさらば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wonderful! Well then, farewell...\""},{"lineNumber":3748,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おぉっ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh...?\""},{"lineNumber":3749,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの手首を、てるがしっかりと掴んでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Teru was firmly gripping Rance's wrist."},{"lineNumber":3750,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You...\""},{"lineNumber":3751,"originalJapaneseLine":"（うっ、お、襲ってくるか……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Ugh, is she going to attack...?)"},{"lineNumber":3752,"originalJapaneseLine":"「服を着たままどうするつもりだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What do you intend to do while still wearing your clothes?"},{"lineNumber":3753,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まさかそのままで湯に浸かるつもりか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You don't mean to soak in the bath just like that, do you?\""},{"lineNumber":3754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":3755,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………こんな展開になるとは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I didn't expect this to happen.\""},{"lineNumber":3756,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そら、背中を出せ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, show me your back.\""},{"lineNumber":3757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おぉ……後ろから槍で突き刺すとか","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh... stabbing me with a spear from behind or"},{"lineNumber":3758,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハタキでずたずたにするとか……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"cutting me to shreds with a duster or something...?\""},{"lineNumber":3759,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿をほざく前に出せと言ったら出せ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Before you spout nonsense, when I say show it, show it."},{"lineNumber":3760,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我が流してくれよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will wash it for you.\""},{"lineNumber":3761,"originalJapaneseLine":"「てるさんに背中を流してもらう日が来るとは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I never thought a day would come where Teru-san would wash my back..."},{"lineNumber":3762,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日は雪か……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it snowing today...?"},{"lineNumber":3763,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが怖々と背中を晒して風呂椅子に腰掛けると、","translatedEnglishLine":"When Rance fearfully exposed his back and sat on the bath stool,"},{"lineNumber":3764,"originalJapaneseLine":"てるがその背後に回った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Teru moved behind him."},{"lineNumber":3765,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ……大きいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... it's big.\""},{"lineNumber":3766,"originalJapaneseLine":"「男の背中だからな、がははは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because it's a man's back, gahahaha.\""},{"lineNumber":3767,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが元就よりは小さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But it's smaller than Motonari's.\""},{"lineNumber":3768,"originalJapaneseLine":"「妖怪と一緒にすんな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't lump me together with a youkai!\""},{"lineNumber":3769,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ……憑かれる前の元就よりは大きいか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... I suppose it's bigger than Motonari before he was possessed.\""},{"lineNumber":3770,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どういう風の吹き回しだ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What kind of wind is blowing this way?"},{"lineNumber":3771,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いよいよ俺様に惚れたか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Have you finally fallen for me?\""},{"lineNumber":3772,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何。腹のこやつが出てきて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What. That belly of yours appeared,"},{"lineNumber":3773,"originalJapaneseLine":"　父はどのような、と問われた時に","translatedEnglishLine":"and when asked how your father is,"},{"lineNumber":3774,"originalJapaneseLine":"　答えられる事を増やそうと思っただけよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I just wanted to be able to answer more things.\""},{"lineNumber":3775,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、むむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"M-mmm.\""},{"lineNumber":3776,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……てるさんも、気にしとらんようで","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It seems that Teru-san isn't really concerned either,"},{"lineNumber":3777,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ガキ優先になってるんだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"and is prioritizing the kid.\""},{"lineNumber":3778,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふ。さあ、どうかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph. Well, I wonder."},{"lineNumber":3779,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあ行くぞ――――！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's go――――!\""},{"lineNumber":3780,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃあああぁっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaahhh!?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弾丸のように駆けるてるに、
つられてランスも最前線へと駆け出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Rance is drawn along, rushing out to the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははは！　総統様のおなりじゃーーー！
敵は全部ころーす！」
「毛利が長姉、てる…………参る！」
「ふんっふっふーん……
さぁ、覗きの時間がやってきましたよと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, the time for peeping has come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰が来るかなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder who will show up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さぁて、湯浴みか……」
「おっと、来た。
さあチャンスターイム！」
ランスは手近な掃除用具入れに隠れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance hid in the nearby cleaning supplies closet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「湯だけJAPAN様式というのも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Having only the water be in the Japanese style is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妙なものだが……」
（ぬっ、てるさんか……流石にああも腹がでかいと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Uh, Teru-san... as expected, with such a big belly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 襲う気にならん……）
てるは服にかけた手を止め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teru stopped her hand that was on her clothes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの所まで一直線に歩き出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and started walking straight towards Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （げ、げげげ！　ば、ばれ……！）
「……貴様か。何をしている」
「が、がはははは、よく分かったな！
俺の完全な隠密を見破るとは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To see through my perfect stealth!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たわけ。掃除用具が乱れている気配があったから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fool. Because there was a sign the cleaning tools were disturbed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 調べてみれば……」
「ふははは、流石はてるさんだな！
見事！　ではいざさらば……」
「お、おぉっ……？」
ランスの手首を、てるがしっかりと掴んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teru was firmly gripping Rance's wrist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （うっ、お、襲ってくるか……）
「服を着たままどうするつもりだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What do you intend to do while still wearing your clothes?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさかそのままで湯に浸かるつもりか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You don't mean to soak in the bath just like that, do you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………こんな展開になるとは」
「そら、背中を出せ」
「お、おぉ……後ろから槍で突き刺すとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-oh... stabbing me with a spear from behind or

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハタキでずたずたにするとか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cutting me to shreds with a duster or something...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬鹿をほざく前に出せと言ったら出せ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Before you spout nonsense, when I say show it, show it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が流してくれよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will wash it for you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てるさんに背中を流してもらう日が来るとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I never thought a day would come where Teru-san would wash my back...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は雪か……？」
ランスが怖々と背中を晒して風呂椅子に腰掛けると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance fearfully exposed his back and sat on the bath stool,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てるがその背後に回った。
「ふむ……大きいな」
「男の背中だからな、がははは」
「だが元就よりは小さい」
「妖怪と一緒にすんな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't lump me together with a youkai!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……憑かれる前の元就よりは大きいか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... I suppose it's bigger than Motonari before he was possessed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どういう風の吹き回しだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What kind of wind is blowing this way?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いよいよ俺様に惚れたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have you finally fallen for me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何。腹のこやつが出てきて、
父はどのような、と問われた時に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and when asked how your father is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 答えられる事を増やそうと思っただけよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just wanted to be able to answer more things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む、むむ」
「……てるさんも、気にしとらんようで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It seems that Teru-san isn't really concerned either,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガキ優先になってるんだな」
「ふ。さあ、どうかな。
さあ行くぞ――――！」
「ぎゃあああぁっ！？」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Before you spout nonsense, when I say show it, show it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が流してくれよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will wash it for you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てるさんに背中を流してもらう日が来るとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I never thought a day would come where Teru-san would wash my back...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は雪か……？」
ランスが怖々と背中を晒して風呂椅子に腰掛けると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance fearfully exposed his back and sat on the bath stool,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てるがその背後に回った。
「ふむ……大きいな」
「男の背中だからな、がははは」
「だが元就よりは小さい」
「妖怪と一緒にすんな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't lump me together with a youkai!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……憑かれる前の元就よりは大きいか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... I suppose it's bigger than Motonari before he was possessed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どういう風の吹き回しだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What kind of wind is blowing this way?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いよいよ俺様に惚れたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have you finally fallen for me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何。腹のこやつが出てきて、
父はどのような、と問われた時に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and when asked how your father is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 答えられる事を増やそうと思っただけよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just wanted to be able to answer more things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む、むむ」
「……てるさんも、気にしとらんようで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It seems that Teru-san isn't really concerned either,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガキ優先になってるんだな」
「ふ。さあ、どうかな。
さあ行くぞ――――！」
「ぎゃあああぁっ！？」
